scripts.develop: NODE_ENV=development npm run js -- serve --mode=development & npm run static -- -w && wait
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run static && npm run svgr && npm run images && NODE_ENV=production npm run js -- --mode=production
scripts.images: mkdir -p dist/images && cp -r src/images/* dist/images && cd src/images && find * -type f \( -name '*.jpg' -o -name '*.png' \) -print0 | xargs -0 -P4 -I{} sh -c 'cwebp -q 80 $0 -o ../../dist/images/${0%.*}.webp' {}
